title: Fix event update loop
body: Create a custom event loop to handle UI updates efficiently.

title: Fix cancelling preprocessing terminates app
body: "os.kill(self.preprocessing_process.pid, signal.CTRL_C_EVENT)" terminates the whole program.

title: Reserve preproccessing progress bar space
body:
The progress bar moves too much when multiple files are being downloaded quickly.

Keep only one instance of the progress bar and clear it when downloading.

title: Add console output to prepoccessing tab
body: To track downloads and errors.

title: Make console output log file
body: Add logging capability to allow for extensive tracking.

title: Add all Ray parameters to UI
body: Give more control to the user.

title: Add all DSK parameters to UI
body: Give more control to the user.

title: Add all Kover parameters to UI
body: Give more control to the user.

title: Fix resizing issues
body: Allow frames to be scrollable when the window size is too small.

title: Add download speed meter
body: Quality of life improvement.

title: Add Express tab
body: Add a tab to automate the workflow of the application.

title: Improve "latest metadata for AMR" tab UI
body: Remove redundant action requirements to use the tab and improve its robustness.

title: Add Analysis tab
body: Add the Analysis tab that is responsible for studying the results of the Kover learn step.

title: Read license of third party dependencies
Dockerize project
body: Dockerize project for ease of use.

title: Add versions
body: Add versions to improve development tracking.

title: Add website
body: Add a website for documentation purposes.

title: Add copy funcationaliy to tables
body: Allow the user to copy data from tables by CTRL+C or right-clicking.

title: Fix dirty buffer error in Ray
body: Fix the Ray dirty buffer loop that happens randomly when the count of .fna files is large.

title: Fix select directory on latest commit when downloading metadata files
Move independent functions outside of gui.py
Change "Pick Dataset" depending on selected method
Make run.ps1 automatically install venv if it does not exist
Add load from reads in dataset creation
Make cmd output buffered
body: Allow for line changes using \r in the cmd output

title: Change K-mer select in preprocessing to spinbox
Auto check if a kover dataset has folds disable CV if not
body:
Add function when selecting Split IDs from `self.kover_learn_frame_control_panel_hp_selector` that changes `self.hp_choices` to remove `kover.HpChoice.CV` if `folds_count == 0`

```
match = re.search(r"(Folds: )(\d+)", "<result string>")

folds_count = int(match.group(2))
```

title: Change dataset creation entry to spinbox
Add labels and move hovertips to the labels
Add option to make train/test IDs for dataset split
Have one wsl processing running and pipe all commands to it
Fix bug with paths cotaining spaces
Hide ctk.CTkScrollableFrame scrollbar when not needed
Disable MouseScroll binding of ctk.CTkScrollableFrame when child with MouseScroll binding is entered
Add ability to resize for all widgets
Fix infinite recursion in scrollableframe when its height is less than the size of elements
